Text:
hey bro I wanted to thank you for all this metal you have uploaded in the past and hope that you continue this barrage of music.I have grabbed everything so far and has made quite the collection. your dedication to spreading the word of steel to masses is greatly appreciated and as far as I am concerned ...YOU ARE THE TRUE METAL MASTER. 

\m/
As usual many thanx to you :)
Thank you so much. You never disappoint. T.
